"Yuva Global Foundation has joined hands with Sumukha Manovikasa Kendra (SMK), a home for autism children in Bangalore. The project focuses on building an integrated approach of development for them with prime attention on Diagnosis and Assessments, Early Interventions & Counselling, Education and Life Skills Training. Children in SMK have not much to look up to. Already reeling under poverty and other social evils, these children are hardly supported by their families and left alone. 
The objective of the project is to help enable these children learn and function intellectually, physically and socially within their limitations. The project focuses on developing Individualised Education Programme (IEP), according to the needs and ability of each child. 
The kids receiving these gifts are very excited. Akash, a student from North Karnataka says (translated by a volunteer) "learning while playing is so much of fun, I will share this with all my friends here."

Being conscious of the environment we live in, and reducing our carbon footprint, is the need of the hour. Keeping this in mind, we've introducing Bicycle Deliveries! This green initiative was first launched in Mumbai; and we're now testing it in other major cities such as Bangalore, Hyderabad, Delhi and Chennai, through multiple service partners. 
So, the next time you accept your Amazon parcel, ask the delivery associate how he came. A glass of water would be much appreciated! Cheers to the real heroes on the streets, making your deliveries faster. 

P.S. If you receive a bicycle delivery, don't forget to tweet about it with #SmileDelivered :)

Love Comics and Manga? What would you do in these situations? Let us know in the comments section below :)

1) An apocalyptic meteor is heading towards earth. How will you save the day?
A: Fly out to the meteor and use your strength to push it out of its trajectory and send it crashing towards the sun. 
B: Engineer a device which shoots missiles to the meteor such that it disintegrates before it reached earth. 

2) There is a door that leads to the device that is the only thing that can save the planet- the time is ticking. What would you do?
A: Come up with the algorithm to open the door safely.
B: Use heat vision to cut through the door- or smash it down.

3) You are under attack by someone much bigger than you, what do you do?
A You employ your martial art skills to smash the hell out of the big-fat monster. 
B You use your muscle power to beat the guts out of the moster and swing him out of the earth, offering him a new planet for his eacape

4) If you wanted to win the Olympics for swimming- which superhero would you to be the fastest?
A Superman
B Batman

5) You're at a crime-scene. How do you solve the mystery?
A Piece all the clues together- interview the Police commissioner- find out on your computer about the suspects- there you have your criminal.
B With your vision and genius level intellect, crime-solving is easy. And the investigation and journalism experience helps.
